rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/accommodation/what-are-the-problems-with-student-housing">     <title>What are the problems with student housing?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/accommodation/what-are-the-problems-with-student-housing</link>     <description>From damp to deposits, an NUS report has highlighted many of the
